title: Drag Race UK's Baga Chipz has 'signed up' for Celebrity First Dates
text:
Baga Chipz will apparently be looking for love on a TV near you soon Picture: BBC

RuPaul’s Drag Race UK contestant Baga Chipz had apparently bagged a spot on an upcoming episode of Celebrity First Dates.

Channel 4 bosses are said to have offered the performer a significant sum of money to take part in the show.

‘As soon as producers saw Baga on Drag Race UK they knew they wanted her,’ a source told the Daily Star.

‘They love the idea of getting a drag queen on the show. Viewers will get to know the person underneath all the make-up and wacky outfits.’

Could Baga’s Thatcher impression make its way to First Dates? (Picture: BBC)

Previous well-known faces to have popped up on the programme include Jamie Laing, Blue singer Duncan James and Gogglebox’s Scarlett Moffat.

Baga herself hasn’t confirmed the reports, but she did tell reporters that ‘I’ve got lots coming up on TV. Big shows. I’m getting really big money.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

As a cast member of the inaugral season of Drag Race UK, we know that the queen’s profile is only going to get bigger and bigger.

Her typically OTT impression of Margaret Thatcher in last week’s Snatch Game won the performer rave reviews and resulted in her tying with The Vivienne as winners.

And while we’re at it, let’s not even mention Geri Horner’s lackluster appearance on the judging panel…

RuPaul’s Drag Race UK returns Thursday at 8pm on BBC iPlayer.

description: RuPaul's Drag Race UK star Baga Chipz has apparently signed up to be featured in the next series of Celebrity First Dates.
